text: Anagema hanagenka, Ra Anumzamo'a amanage hie hunka zamasamio. Ama mopafima nemaniza vahera waini tina rama'a eri hakare hanuge'za nene'za neginagi hugahaze. Deviti noma erino kinima manisania ne'teti vuno, pristi vahe'ene kasnampa vahe'ene maka Jerusalemi kumapima nemaniza vahete'enema vanige'za waini tina nene'za neginagi hugahaze.
